kill_switch_message_text: Testing my p33ps.  Go outside and play.
mandatory_update_message_text: A mandatory update is required in order for you to continue using this application.  Please forgive our mess.
terms_of_use_text: Use our stuff in the way it was intended please.

versions.changes:
* Added message history.
* Showing/Hiding message history w/preference toggle.

BUILD 2:
* Human readable dates on messages in history list.
* Reuse text from previous message.

BUILD 3:
* Pressed states for the Group List.
* Haptic feedback on touches.
* Animations in key parts of the app.

BUILD 4:
* Significant state bug in SplashActivity corrected.
* List of updates displayed in update dialog.
* Fixed Play Store URLs.

BUILD 5:
* Added sound on send with enable/disable preference.
* Added button check to avoid SMS flooding.

BUILD 7:
* Formatting on the Compose Message Screen.
